alert.note: Alert for Winona (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 3:55PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Winona County through 430 PM CDT... At 354 PM CDT, the public reported a strong thunderstorm over Altura, or 14 miles west of Winona, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Public reported pea sized hail near St Charles at 353 pm. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Stockton around 405 PM CDT. Rollingstone around 410 PM CDT. Winona and Goodview around 415 PM CDT. Fountain City around 420 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Whitman, Minnesota City, Utica, Bethany and Minneiska. This includes Interstate 90 in Minnesota between mile markers 238 and 241. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
